Conditional Flag: This needs to be returned to HubSpot immediately after the contact record is created in CentralReach.

Transformation Rule: CAST_TO_STRING(hubspot_record_id) → TRIM → REMOVE_NON_DIGITS(optional) → ENSURE_NO_DECIMALS/SCIENTIFIC_NOTATION → PREFIX_WITH("hubspot:contact:") → SET contact.externalSystemId
map_enum(phi_gender) → contact.gender (normalize case; map MALE→Male, FEMALE→Female; else no-write/log)

HubSpot Property Labels: Guardian First Name + Guardian Last Name
Transformation Rule: concat(phi_first_name__cloned_, phi_last_name) → Guardian; split(Guardian) → phi_first_name__cloned_, phi_last_name

HubSpot Property Labels: If services will be in more than one location, list the other address
